alert.note: Alert for Kimble (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 21 at 3:18PM CDT until June 21 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM CDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL KIMBLE COUNTY... At 318 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Us-83 Near The Kerr-Kimble County Line, or 8 miles east of Telegraph, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Segovia, Telegraph and South Llano River State Park. This includes Interstate 10 between Mile Markers 461 and 466, and between Mile Markers 471 and 475. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
